name: RM - Fashion - Yohji Yamamoto
prompt: avant-garde fashion photography of {prompt} in the style of Yohji Yamamoto . oversized silhouettes, master of black, deconstructed tailoring, draping layers, fluid fabrics, dark romanticism, avant-garde streetwear
negative_prompt: tight fit, bright neon colors, rigid, stiff, preppy, casual, plain

name: RM - Fashion - Rei Kawakubo (Comme des Garçons)

negative_prompt: traditional beauty, sexy, form-fitting, standard suit, boring, symmetrical

name: RM - Fashion - Issey Miyake
